# filter_by_category { #py_mealdb.MealDB.filter_by_category }

```python
MealDB.filter_by_category(category)
```

Retrieves meals belonging to a specific category.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name     | Type   | Description                                                           | Default    |
|----------|--------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| category | str    | The category to filter by (e.g., 'Seafood', 'Dessert', 'Vegetarian'). | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type     | Description                                                            |
|--------|----------|------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | MealList | MealList object containing meal summaries from the specified category. |

## Raises {.doc-section .doc-section-raises}

| Name   | Type                  | Description                                              |
|--------|-----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------|
|        | httpx.HTTPError       | Check httpx's documentation for all possible exceptions. |
|        | httpx.HTTPStatusError | If the API returns a non-2xx status code.                |
